001package ca.gc.cra.radar.application.port;
002
003import ca.gc.cra.radar.domain.net.RawFrame;
004import ca.gc.cra.radar.domain.net.TcpSegment;
005import java.util.Optional;
006
007/**
008 * Port that decodes captured link-layer frames into TCP segments for higher-level processing.
009 *
010 * @since RADAR 0.1-doc
011 */
012public interface FrameDecoder {
013  /**
014   * Attempts to decode a raw frame into a TCP segment.
015   *
016   * @param frame raw frame captured from the network; never {@code null}
017   * @return decoded segment when recognizable as TCP; otherwise {@link Optional#empty()}
018   * @throws Exception if decoding fails irrecoverably (e.g., malformed headers)
019   * @since RADAR 0.1-doc
020   */
021  Optional<TcpSegment> decode(RawFrame frame) throws Exception;
022}
